metadata.title: Parliamentary Committee on National Security to meet on Tuesday

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Mar 17 (APP): Speaker National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq on Monday convened in-camera meeting of the Parliamentary Committee on National Security on March 18 at 11:00 am in Parliament House. The in-camera meeting of the Parliamentary Committee on National Security will meet under chairmanship of Ayaz Sadiq in which a comprehensive briefing on the country's security situation would be presented to the committee members, said a press release issued by the National Assembly Secretariat. The military leadership would also brief the committee on the current security situation. The meeting would be convened in the National Assembly Hall and to be attended by parliamentary leaders from all political parties represented in the Parliament, along with their representatives. Furthermore, the cabinet members would also participate in the in-camera meeting of Parliamentary Committee on National Security.
